name: NoneMatchFilter
description: The NoneMatchFilter class is a concrete implementation of GroupFilter that returns true when none of the child filters return true for the given object.
overview:
The NoneMatchFilter class is a concrete implementation of GroupFilter that returns true when none of the child filters return true for the given object. This filter is essentially a way to exclude objects that match any of several criteria, making it perfect for filtering out unwanted items, blocks, or entities.

NoneMatchFilter is particularly useful when you want to find everything except certain specific types. This is commonly used to exclude common blocks when searching for rare ones, or to filter out unwanted items from inventory searches.

The NoneMatchFilter class provides:

- Exclusion logic: Returns true only when no child filters match
- Flexible exclusion count: Can exclude based on any number of criteria
- Fluent interface: Methods return the NoneMatchFilter instance for method chaining
- Negation pattern: Equivalent to the negation of an AnyMatchFilter

constructors.description: Creates a new NoneMatchFilter with no child filters. Use the add() method to add filters to the group.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a child filter to the exclusion list. Returns this instance for method chaining.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a child filter from the exclusion list. Returns this instance for method chaining.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter to remove from exclusion

methods.name: getFilters
methods.description: Returns an immutable list of all exclusion filters. Copy of the internal filter list.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Tests whether the given object matches NONE of the exclusion filters. Returns true only if no child filters return true.

methods.name: and
methods.description: Combines this filter with another using AND logic.

methods.name: or
methods.description: Combines this filter with another using OR logic.

methods.name: not
methods.description: Creates a negated version of this filter.
